description: Sent every time a promocode is created from the ECommerce PromocodeService

amount.description: Amount of discount in given type

producerReference.description: Unique tracking id generated by producer that may be used to trace the message inside Vortex. e.g. the id in the producer database.

eventTime.description: Date & time (millisecond accurate) of event that triggered the publishing of this message, ISO 8601 with offset e.g. 2002-09-24T16:35:56.123Z

eventName.description: Name of event that triggered the publish of the message. Camel case, past-tense e.g. ticketBooked

appRegisterId.description: Identifier of application producing the message

serviceVersion.description: Producing service version in SemVer format.

origin.description: Some indication of message origin, eg. server hostname, VPC, etc.

environmentName.description: Environment that producer is running in e.g. prod.

conversationId.description: Unique Id that tracks the sequence of message calls that led to the triggering event.

contextUri.description: Uri of the context attached to the resource for the event.

entryPointId.description: ID of the entrypoint, eg. 111 for Trainline Leisure Desktop Web.

affiliateId.description: Affiliate code identifier. eg. PAYPAL, MTT, etc.

redemptionQuantity.description: Number of times promocode can be Redeemed

redeemedQuantity.description: Number of times promocode has been Redeemed

currencyCode.description: Currency in with promocode can be use
